trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Stride documentation, specifically designed for game developers, visual creators, and all users of the powerful Stride game engine. This resource is packed with detailed tutorials, in-depth manuals, and comprehensive API references to help you bring your game development visions to life with Stride. Whether you're new to Stride or looking to hone your skills, you'll find everything you need right here. Dive in, and let's create something extraordinary!
trans-unit.target: Welcome to the Stride documentation, specifically designed for game developers, visual creators, and all users of the powerful Stride game engine. This resource is packed with detailed tutorials, in-depth manuals, and comprehensive API references to help you bring your game development visions to life with Stride. Whether you're new to Stride or looking to hone your skills, you'll find everything you need right here. Dive in, and let's create something extraordinary!

trans-unit.source: !TIP This documentation is primarily for users of the Stride engine. If you are interested in contributing to the Stride engine code base, please follow the Stride contribution instructions.
trans-unit.target: !TIP This documentation is primarily for users of the Stride engine. If you are interested in contributing to the Stride engine code base, please follow the Stride contribution instructions.

trans-unit.source: Discover how to build projects and complete tasks in Stride with our manual-related step-by-step tutorials.
trans-unit.target: Discover how to build projects and complete tasks in Stride with our manual-related step-by-step tutorials.

trans-unit.source: Explore a range of tutorials for the Stride game engine. Our current tutorials include: Game Studio, C# Beginner and C# Intermediate.
trans-unit.target: Explore a range of tutorials for the Stride game engine. Our current tutorials include: Game Studio, C# Beginner and C# Intermediate.

trans-unit.source: Learn about the latest features and improvements in Stride, as well as previous versions.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the latest features and improvements in Stride, as well as previous versions.

trans-unit.source: Access Stride's API documentation, which covers methods, properties, and other essential information.
trans-unit.target: Access Stride's API documentation, which covers methods, properties, and other essential information.

trans-unit.source: !NOTE Please note that while our English documentation is actively updated, translations may not always be current. We recommend English-literate users to refer to the original for the latest information. To help with translations or report discrepancies, please see our GitHub or community forums. Your input is invaluable!
trans-unit.target: !NOTE Please note that while our English documentation is actively updated, translations may not always be current. We recommend English-literate users to refer to the original for the latest information. To help with translations or report discrepancies, please see our GitHub or community forums.
